SenderRelationId.description: The party that submits the order.

OrderingPartyRelationId.description: The party on whose behalf the goods in the order have to be delivered.

Id.description: The identification that the ordering party uses for the order. On the basis of this identification CB checks whether the order exists for the ordering party (in CB ERP/WMS) and if the update is possible. If so the order will be updated.
